text: Ole Sørensen (25 November 1937 – 29 January 2015) was a former Danish football player. He played 25 matches and scored 7 goals for the Danish national football team between 1961 and 1969, and represented his country at the 1964 European Championship. On the club level, he played for the Copenhagen club KB in Denmark, FC Köln in Germany and PSV Eindhoven in the Netherlands. ==External links== *Danish national team player * Category:1937 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Expatriate footballers in Germany Category:Danish footballers Category:Danish expatriate footballers Category:1964 European Nations' Cup players Category:Denmark international footballers Category:Kjøbenhavns Boldklub players Category:1. title: Ole Sørensen (footballer)
